com.cyc.session

Interface SessionOptions


  • public interface SessionOptions
    A set of modifiable options, such as the name of the cyclist making assertions and the project's KE purpose. The session's configuration may provide defaults for these options (typically via {@link CycSessionConfiguration#getDefaultSessionOptions()) or possibly prevent certain options from being changed.

      Clears all values, reverting to the defaults specified in CycSessionConfiguration.

      Resets the current cyclist value to the default specified in the current CycSessionConfiguration.

      Resets the current DefaultContext value to the default specified in the current CycSessionConfiguration.

      Resets the current KB purpose value to the default specified in the current CycSessionConfiguration.

      Sets the value of the default Cyclist for this CycSession, whose identity will be attached via #$myCreator bookkeeping assertions to new KB entities created in this session.

    • Method Detail

      • getCyclistName

        String getCyclistName()
        Returns the value of the Cyclist. If it has not been set, return null.
        Returns:
        the value of the Cyclist

      • getKePurposeName

        String getKePurposeName()
        Returns the value of the project (KE purpose).
        Returns:
        the value of the project (KE purpose)

      • setCyclistName

        void setCyclistName(String cyclistName)
                    throws SessionCommunicationException,
                           SessionConfigurationException
        Sets the value of the default Cyclist for this CycSession, whose identity will be attached via #$myCreator bookkeeping assertions to new KB entities created in this session.
        Parameters:
        cyclistName - the name of the cyclist term
        Throws:
        SessionCommunicationException - if a communications error occurs or the Cyc server cannot be found.
        SessionConfigurationException - if the cyclist cannot be set.

      • setKePurposeName

        void setKePurposeName(String project)
                      throws SessionCommunicationException,
                             SessionConfigurationException
        Sets the value of the KE purpose, whose project name will be attached via #$myCreationPurpose bookkeeping assertions to new KB entities created in this session.
        Parameters:
        project - the KE Purpose term
        Throws:
        SessionCommunicationException - if a communications error occurs or the Cyc server cannot be found.
        SessionConfigurationException - if the project cannot be set.

      • setShouldTranscriptOperations

        void setShouldTranscriptOperations(boolean shouldTranscriptOperations)
        Declare that KB operations performed in this thread should or shouldn't be transcripted by the Cyc server.
        Parameters:
        shouldTranscriptOperations - flag to control the transcription of the operations

      • getShouldTranscriptOperations

        boolean getShouldTranscriptOperations()
        Will actions in the current thread that modify the KB be transcripted by the Cyc server?
        Returns:
        will KB operations from the current thread be transcripted?
